% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{(X \times Y) \times Z} \\
	\\
	{X \times (Y \times Z)}
	\arrow["{\langle \lambda_{X}, \lambda_{Y}, \lambda_{Z} \rangle}"', curve={height=18pt}, dashed, from=1-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{\langle \rho_{X}, \rho_{Y}, \rho_{Z} \rangle}"', curve={height=18pt}, dashed, from=3-1, to=1-1]
\end{tikzcd}\]
